short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add webpages to your clippings in pr.co

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add webpages to your clippings on pr.co with this convenient browser extension. Whenever on a webpage you'd like to add, just click the pr.co icon on your extension bar, fill in the details and click 'Save Clipping'. Done!
